title: Great 3-1/2 BR Near Tufts Univ Green Line T and Route 93
neighborhood: Medford near Medford Sq and route 93
posting_body: ['Available August 1st.', '\xa0 Great 3-1/2 Bedroom Apartment near Tufts University and great access to Route 93', 'Please Text or Call Craig Scanzio at 617-758-9763 and reference ID #63T-301286380 to setup a showing.', 'When you respond, please leave your full name and the best phone number to call or text you back!', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 63T-301286380', 'Rent: $3,300 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Great 3-1/2 Bedroom Apartment near Tufts University', 'o Prime Location for Tufts Students and just .7 of a mile Walk to the new Green Line T at Tufts University', 'o With new Green Line; easy commute into Boston', 'o Just .4 of mile from Medford Square', 'o Spacious Living & Dining Rm area', 'o Great kitchen with refrigerator, Electric stove, Dishwasher and lots of nice Wood Cabinets!', 'o Hardwood Floors in Living Room & Dining area', 'o (3) Good sized Bedrooms and Extra Room', 'o (2) Parking Spots in Driveway', 'o Washer and Dryer in Unit !', 'o Front and Rear Porch', 'o Great Convenience for Commuting Access to Route 93 to get north or south of the City', 'o 1-1/2 miles to  Davis Square Redline T and Buses to get all over Somerville, Cambridge', 'o In Davis Square you have nice restaurants, shops and just a great place to hang out!', 'o  Just a Great Central Location in Medford-  Must come see !', 'Deposits of 1st Month, Security Deposit and Brokers Fee is requested and Good Credit !', 'FEATURES', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Living Room', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Porch', 'Sunny!', 'Pricing & availability subject to change.', 'The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.']
